content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences or opinions but I can suggest a popular book by Ringo Starr that may serve as a good starting point for readers who are unfamiliar with his works. 

The book I would recommend is "Photograph" by Ringo Starr and David Lynch. This book is a collection of over 300 personal photographs taken by Ringo throughout his life. Along with the images, he shares stories and anecdotes about his experiences, including his time with the Beatles, his solo career, and his travels. 

This book is a great starting point for readers who are unfamiliar with Ringo's work because it offers a personal and visual insight into his life and career, and allows readers to connect with him on a more intimate level. It is an engaging and easy read, and even those who are not necessarily fans of his music will appreciate the candid and nostalgic nature of the photos and stories shared.
